summary:
Experienced engineer with a demonstrated history of working in the Wind Industry and in the Offshore Industry.
Currently working in the Construction & Maintenance Industry.

Skilled in developing (innovative) load bearing products, R&D projects and product failure analysis.
Engineering professional with a result-oriented mentality, team spirit and the ability to efficiently approach and realize product solutions while meeting thoroughly defined requirements.

Strongly driven by passion for progress and innovation.
